characterList: 蜘蛛駱駝蜻蜓鳳凰橄欖玻璃咖啡葡萄吩咐乒乓崔曹

characters.story: "JIH!" the insect sings cheerfully - the front part of the spider character.
"JOO!" the insect sings cheerfully - the back part of the spider character.
"LWOH!" each horse commands sharply - the front part of the camel character.
"TWOH?" it questions curiously like a horse - the back part of the camel character.
"CHING!" the blue insect sings cheerfully - the front part of the dragonfly character through a telescope.
"TING?" the insect questions curiously at the royal court - the back part of the dragonfly character.
"FUNG!" the wind commands sharply as the male phoenix bird soars past the ceiling!
"HWAHNG?" the wind questions curiously about the female phoenix emperor.
See how the tree forms olive (a)? It whispers "Gǎn!" softly!
The tree and magnifying glass bend down drooping - the second part of the olive character.
"BWO!" the jewel covering sings cheerfully - the front part of the glass character.
"LEE?" the jewel questions curiously like Fagin - the back part of the glass character.
"KAH!" the mouth sings cheerfully - the first drop of the coffee character.
"FAY!" the mouth sings cheerfully - the last drop of the coffee character.
"POO?" the flowers question curiously, bound up with dog tags - the first part of grapes.
"TAO?" the flowers and canteen question curiously - the second part of grapes.
"FEN!" the mouth sings cheerfully - the first part of instruct.
"FOO!" the mouth commands sharply - I should have instructed you to stand by!
"PING!" the left-legged troop sings cheerfully - ping in ping-pong!
This character represents pong, singing "PAHNG!" cheerfully!
"TSWAY!" the pterodactyl sings cheerfully - the surname Cui!
A striking symbol for cao that asks "TSAO?" curiously - a vivid image to remember!
